Text.Page:
Those wretched draelkar pylons are affecting more than just the wendigos. We can't let Thulsa gain the upper hand in force strength.

Kill the {@LinkCreature:51#2021#snowfield arachnens} and {@LinkCreature:51#2031#frostwalker sabertooths}.

Report to Thenuvia at Icebase Defiance when mission is complete.
You've earned the thanks of the federation!
It looks like you haven't completed your mission yet.
